base_convert.summary: Returns a number converted from one base as another base.

bin_to_dec.summary: Returns an integer converted from a binary string.

bin_to_fraction.summary: Returns a decimal fraction converted from a binary string.

bin_to_hex.summary: Returns a hexadecimal string converted from a binary string.

dec_to_bin.summary: Returns a given value as a string of binary digits.

dec_to_hex.summary: Returns a given value as a string of hexadecimal digits.

dec_to_oct.summary: Returns a given value as a string of octal digits.

dec_to_roman.summary: Returns a Roman numeral string converted from an integer.

fraction_to_bin.summary: Returns a binary string converted from a decimal fraction.

hex_to_bin.summary: Returns a binary string converted from a hexadecimal string.

hex_to_dec.summary: Returns an integer converted from an hexadecimal string.

oct_to_dec.summary: Returns an integer converted from an octal string.

roman_to_dec.summary: Returns an integer converted from a Roman numeral string.

bitwise_reverse16.summary: Returns the given 16-bit integer with bits in reverse order.

bitwise_reverse32.summary: Returns the given 32-bit integer with bits in reverse order.

bitwise_reverse8.summary: Returns the given 8-bit integer with bits in reverse order.

bitwise_rol.summary: Returns the given integer rotated left a number of bit positions.

bitwise_ror.summary: Returns the given integer rotated right a number of bit positions.

bit_clear.summary: Returns a bitfield with a given bit cleared to 0.

bit_set.summary: Returns a bitfield with a given bit set to 1.

bit_test.summary: Returns the value of a selected bit within a bitfield.

bit_toggle.summary: Returns a bitfield with a given bit toggled.

b64_to_bytes.summary: Returns a string of raw bytes, 8 bits each.

bin_to_bytes.summary: Returns a string of raw bytes (8 bits each) representing the given binary string.

bytes_to_b64.summary: Returns a string of base64 digits (RFC 3548), 6 bits each.

bytes_to_bin.summary: Returns a string of binary digits, 1 bit each.

bytes_to_hex.summary: Returns a string of hexadecimal digits, 4 bits each.

decode_real_double.summary: Returns a real value decoded from the given string of raw bytes in IEEE 754 double precision format.

encode_real_double.summary: Returns a string of raw bytes representing the given number encoded in IEEE 754 double precision format.

hex_to_bytes.summary: Returns a string of raw bytes (8 bits each) representing the given hexadecimal string.

value_min_bits.summary: Returns the smallest number of words of a given size that can be used to store a given value.

word_max_value.summary: Returns the largest unsigned integer that can be stored in a given number of words of a given size.

cambridge_encode.summary: Returns given string with the interior letters of each word scrambled.

rc4.summary: Returns the given string encrypted/decrypted with the RC4 algorithm using the given key.

rot13.summary: Returns the given text encrypted/decrypted with the rot13 algorithm.

vigenere_ascii.summary: Returns the given string enciphered or deciphered using a simple Vigenere style cipher, and filtering out non-printable characters.

vigenere_cipher.summary: Returns the given string enciphered or deciphered using a Vigenere style cipher.

crc16.summary: Returns a CRC16-CCITT hash value for a given string.

md2.summary: Returns an MD2 hash (RFC 1319) computed from a given string.

soundex.summary: Returns the Soundex value of the given string.

date_format.summary: Returns a formatted string generated from a date-time.

date_get_easter.summary: Returns the date-time of Easter for the given year.

time_string.summary: Returns the system time as a string in 12 or 24 hour "HH:MM:SS" format.

unix_timestamp.summary: Returns a Unix timestamp for the current or given GameMaker datetime.

cone_volume.summary: Returns the volume of a cone of a given radius and height.

is_clockwise.signature: is_clockwise(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3)
is_clockwise.summary: Returns true if the given points are in clockwise order.

lines_intersect.signature: lines_intersect(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4, segment)
lines_intersect.summary: Returns a scalar (t) that indicates if two lines or segments intersect.

line_get_slope.summary: Returns the slope of the given line.

point_in_polygon.summary: Returns true if test point is inside the given 2D polygon.

point_line_distance.summary: Returns the distance from the given point to the given line.

polygon_area.summary: Returns the internal area of the given polygon.

polygon_centroid.summary: Returns the centroid of a given 2D polygon as a ds_list containing a coordiate pair.

polygon_to_triangles.summary: Returns a list of triangles created from a given 2D polygon.

sphere_volume.summary: Returns the volume of a sphere of a given radius.

triangle_side_area.summary: Returns the area of triangle given the length of three sides.

bias.summary: Returns the given value with a bias function applied to it.

boxstep.summary: Returns 0 when (x <= a), 1 when (x >= b), a linear transition from 0 to 1 when (a < x < b), or (-1) on error (a == b).

gain.summary: Returns the given value with a gain function applied to it.

gammacorrect.summary: Returns the given value with gamma correction applied to it.

map_range.summary: Returns a value remapped from one range to another.

smoothstep.summary: Returns 0 when (x <= a), 1 when (x >= b), a smooth transition from 0 to 1 otherwise.

spline.summary: Returns the Catmull-Rom interpolation of the given knot values at the given parameter position.

spline4.summary: Returns the Catmull-Rom interpolation of the given knot values at the given parameter position.

combination.summary: Returns the number of unique subsets created from all combinations of a number of elements.

erf.summary: Returns the probability that a Gaussian random number falls within a given range.

exp_dist.summary: Returns a random number with exponential distribution.

factorial.summary: Returns the factorial of a given number.

gauss.summary: Returns a pseudo-random number with an exact Gaussian distribution.

permutation.summary: Returns the number of unique subsets created from all permutations of a number of elements.

random_weighted.summary: Returns a randomly selected index based on their given relative probabilities.

roll_dice.summary: Returns the sum of a number of die rolls using dice with a given number of sides.

acos.summary: Returns the arccosine of a given angle for the nth repetition.

asin.summary: Returns the arcsine of a given angle for the nth repetition.

factor.summary: Returns an array containing the prime factors of a given integer.

factor_quadratic.summary: Returns a string of factors for any quadratic equation (ax^2+bx+c=0), where a = 1 and b and c are integers.

fibonacci.summary: Returns the nth number of the Fibonacci sequence.

gcd.summary: Returns the greatest common divisor of the given integers.

is_even.summary: Returns true if a given value is even, false otherwise.

is_factor.summary: Returns true if a given divisor is a factor of a given value, false otherwise.

is_odd.summary: Returns true if a given value is odd, false otherwise.

is_power.summary: Returns true if a given value is a power of the a given base, or false if it is not (or if it cannot be determined).

lcm.summary: Returns the least common multiple of the given integers.

next_pow2.summary: Returns the next power-of-two greater than or equal to a given value.

round_fixed.summary: Returns a given number rounded to the a number of places.

select.summary: Returns an argument selected by n.

select_index.summary: Returns the index of an argument matching a given value.

select_relative.summary: Returns an argument in a position relative to a given value.

select_relative_wrap.summary: Returns an argument in a position relative to a given value.

sum_interval.summary: Returns the sum of consecutive integers between m and n (inclusive).

toggle.summary: Returns the given Boolean value negated.

number_format.summary: Returns a number as a string with thousands and decimal markers.

speakable_password.summary: Returns a random speakable password of a given length.

string_add_spaces.summary: Returns given string with spaces inserted between each character.

string_extract.summary: Returns the element at given index within a string of elements.

string_left.summary: Returns a number of characters from the start of a string.

string_limit.summary: Returns a given string, truncated if it exceeds a certain length.

string_lpad.summary: Returns a string padded on its left to a given length.

string_ltrim.summary: Returns given string with whitespace stripped from its start.

string_nato.summary: Returns a given string as expressed by the NATO phonetic alphabet.

string_parse.summary: Returns a list of token-separated substrings from a given string.

string_parse_number.summary: Returns number of token-separated substrings from a given string.

string_parse_single.summary: Returns the nth token-separated substring from a given string.

string_random.summary: Returns a string of a given length composed of characters randomly selected from a given set.

string_remove_whitespace.summary: Consolidates and removes all whitespace from a string, optionally replacing it with a character or string.

string_reverse.summary: Returns a given string with the characters in reverse order.

string_right.summary: Returns a number of characters from the end of a string.

string_rpad.summary: Returns a string padded on its right to a given length.

string_rpos.summary: Returns the right-most position of a substring within a string.

string_rtrim.summary: Returns given string with whitespace stripped from its end.

string_shuffle.summary: Returns a given string with charactars shuffled.

string_split.summary: Returns a string with break characters inserted at a given interval.

string_stagger_case.summary: Returns a string with the letters in staggered case, such as: "hElLo! hOw ArE yOu ToDaY?"

string_trim.summary: Returns given string with whitespace stripped from its start and end.

string_ucfirst.summary: Returns a string with the first character capitalized.

string_ucwords.summary: Returns a string with each word capitalized.

string_wordwrap.summary: Returns a string with break characters inserted between words at a given character interval.

array_select_relative.summary: Returns an array element in a position relative to a given value.

array_select_relative_wrap.summary: Returns an array element in a position relative to a given value.

explode.summary: Returns an array of strings parsed from a given string of elements separated by a delimiter.

explode_real.summary: Returns an array of real values parsed from a given string of elements separated by a delimiter.

implode.summary: Returns a string of elements from a given array of strings and separated by a delimiter.

implode_real.summary: Returns a string of elements from a given array of real values and separated by a delimiter.

ds_grid_delete_column.summary: Deletes from a grid the column at a given column index.

ds_grid_delete_row.summary: Deletes from a grid the row at a given row index.

ds_grid_draw.summary: Draws the data of a given grid at a screen location.

ds_grid_duplicate.summary: Returns a duplicate of the given grid.

ds_grid_filter_gaussian.summary: Performs a Gaussian convolution on a given grid.

ds_grid_filter_gaussian_wrap.summary: Performs a Gaussian convolution on a given grid, wrapping around the boundaries of the grid if needed.

ds_grid_flood_fill.summary: Fills a bounded area within a grid with a given value.

ds_grid_get_bicubic.summary: Returns the bicubic interpolation of the sixteen grid cells surrounding the given fractional coordinate.

ds_grid_get_bilinear.summary: Returns the bilinear interpolation of the four grid cells surrounding a given fractional coordinate.

ds_grid_mirror.summary: Rearranges the elements of a given grid by mirroring horizontally and/or vertically.

ds_grid_swap_columns.summary: Exchanges the contents of two entire grid columns.

ds_grid_swap_rows.summary: Exchanges the contents of two entire grid rows.

ds_grid_translate.summary: Shifts the contents of a grid by a given number of rows and columns.

ds_list_add_list.summary: Adds a list to a given list and marks it.

ds_list_add_map.summary: Adds a map to a given list and marks it.

ds_list_cv.summary: Returns the coefficient of variation for values in a list.

ds_list_flip.summary: Rearranges the values of a list in reverse order.

ds_list_geometric_mean.summary: Returns the geometric mean of values in a list.

ds_list_max.summary: Returns the maximum value in a list.

ds_list_mean.summary: Returns the arithmetic mean of values in a list.

ds_list_median.summary: Returns the median of the values in the given list.

ds_list_min.summary: Returns the minimum value in a list.

ds_list_pop_standard_deviation.summary: Returns the population standard deviation for values in a list.

ds_list_range.summary: Returns the range of the values in a list.

ds_list_select_relative.summary: Returns a value from a list data structure in a position relative to a given value.

ds_list_select_relative_wrap.summary: Returns a value from a list data structure in a position relative to a given value.

ds_list_standard_deviation.summary: Returns the standard deviation for values in a list.

ds_list_standard_score.summary: Returns the standard score (z-score) of the value at a position in a list.

ds_list_sum.summary: Returns the sum of all values in a list.

ds_list_sum_of_squares.summary: Returns the sum of squares of all values in a list.

ds_list_sum_squares.summary: Returns the sum of squares of all values in a given list.

ds_list_variance.summary: Returns the variance of the values in a given list.

ds_list_vmr.summary: Returns the variance-to-mean ratio of values in a list.

ds_map_clone.summary: Clones a map simply to a new copy and returns the created map.

ds_map_deep_clone.summary: Clones a map deeply to a new copy, cloning any nested maps and lists, and returning the created root map.

ds_map_default_value.summary: Returns the value of a key from a given map, inserting a default value into the map if the key does not yet exist.

ds_map_load.summary: Loads the contents of a file into a new map data structure, returning its id.

ds_map_mirror.summary: Exchanges map keys with map values.

ds_map_save.summary: Saves the contents of a given grid data structure into a file.

file_bin_read_word.summary: Returns a word value of a given byte-size from an open binary file.

file_bin_seek_relative.summary: Sets the file seek pointer of an open binary file to a position relative to its current position.

file_bin_write_word.summary: Writes a binary word of a given byte-size to an open binary file.

file_text_open_read_all.summary: Returns the contents of a given file as a multiline string.

file_text_open_write_all.summary: Writes a multiline string to a given file.

save_screenshot.summary: Saves a successively numbered screenshot within the working directory.

intercept_course.summary: Returns the course direction required to hit a moving target at a given projectile speed, or (-1) if no solution is found.

motion_predict.summary: Returns a list data structure populated with the predicted positions {x1,y1, x2,y2, ... , xsteps,ysteps} of an instance with regard to its current motion, friction, and gravity.

collision_line_first.summary: Returns the instance id of an object colliding with a given line and closest to the first point, or noone if no instance found.

collision_normal.summary: Returns a 2D "surface normal" at a point on or near an instance within a test area.

collision_triangle.signature: collision_triangle(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, object)
collision_triangle.summary: Returns an object instance id that collides with a given triangle.

range_finder.summary: Returns the exact distance to the nearest instance of an object in a given direction from a given point, or noone if no instance is found.

deceleration_distance.summary: Returns the distance travelled by an object moving at a given speed and with a given rate of deceleration.

instance_closest_approach.summary: Returns the distance in pixels (or time in steps) until the calling and given instances are at their nearest separation based on their current positions and speeds.

instance_find_enemy.summary: Returns the nearest instance of an object whose local variable "team" has a different value than the calling instance, or noone if no instance is found.

instance_find_friend.summary: Returns the nearest instance of an object whose local variable "team" has the same value as calling instance, or noone if no instance is found.

instance_find_team.summary: Returns the nearest instance of an object whose local variable "team" has the same value as a given team, or noone if no instance is found.

instance_nearest_notme.summary: Returns the nearest instance to a given point, disregarding the calling instance.

instance_nth_farthest.summary: Returns the id of the nth farthest instance of an object from a given point or noone if none is found.

instance_nth_nearest.summary: Returns the id of the nth nearest instance of an object to a given point or noone if none is found.

instance_singleton.summary: Returns a single instance of the given object, creating one if no instance exists.

ease_towards_direction.summary: Rotates the calling instance towards the target direction, at a given rate and easing.

jump_to_mouse.summary: Moves the calling instance to the position of the mouse cursor.

move_bounce_rectangle.summary: Makes the calling instance reverse direction if it is colliding with the boundary of a given rectangle.

move_follow.summary: Makes the calling instance follow a given instance at a given speed.

move_to_line.summary: Moves the calling instance to the nearest point on a given line or line segment.

turn_towards_direction.summary: Rotates the calling instance towards the target direction, at a given rate.

d3d_model_copy.summary: Returns a model index of a copy of a given model.

draw_background_tiled_area.summary: Draws a repeated background image, tiled to fill a given region and with a given offset.

draw_background_tiled_area_ext.summary: Draws a repeated background image, tiled to fill a given region and with a given offset.

color_mix.summary: Returns a 50/50 mixture of the two given colors.

color_multiply.summary: Returns the product of the two given colors.

color_scale.summary: Returns a given color with each component scaled by a factor.

color_to_cmyk.summary: Returns a list data structure populated by CMYK values of a color, or optionally, the value of a specific color channel.

color_to_hex.summary: Returns a given color as a hexadecimal string in RRGGBB format.

color_to_wavelength.summary: Returns the approximate wavelength of a given color in nanometers.

hex_to_color.summary: Returns an RGB color from a given hexadecimal color code.

hex_to_rgb.summary: Returns a list data structure populated by RGB color component values.

merge_colors.summary: Returns a color merged from a series of two or more colors by a given amount.

merge_color_squared.summary: Returns a color merged from two colors by a given amount, where color components are squared for a more natural mix.

rgb_to_cmyk.summary: Returns a list data structure populated by CMYK values of a color, or optionally, the value of a specific color channel.

rgb_to_hex.summary: Returns a given color as a hexadecimal string in RRGGBB format.

wavelength_to_hue.summary: Returns the approximate HSV color hue [0..255] of a given wavelength.

draw_arc.summary: Draws an arc of an ellipse mimicking draw_arc() from GM5.

draw_chord.summary: Draws a chord of an elliptical disk mimicing draw_chord() from GM5.

draw_crosshair.summary: Draws a pair of horizontal and vertical lines, spanning the room and intersecting a given point.

draw_crosshair_ext.summary: Draws a pair of horizontal and vertical lines, spanning the room and intersecting a given point.

draw_crosshair_width.summary: Draws a pair of horizontal and vertical lines of a given width, spanning the room and intersecting a given point.

draw_crosshair_width_ext.summary: Draws a pair of horizontal and vertical lines, spanning the room and intersecting a given point.

draw_curve.summary: Draws a curve between two points with a given starting angle.

draw_pie.summary: Draws a sector of an elliptical disc, mimicking draw_pie() from GM5.

draw_rectangle_dashed.signature: draw_rectangle_dashed(x1, y1, x2, y2, size, center)
draw_rectangle_dashed.summary: Draws a rectangle made of dashes of a given size.

draw_rectangle_dashed_color.signature: draw_rectangle_dashed_color(x1, y1, x2, y2, col1, col2, col3, col4, size, center)
draw_rectangle_dashed_color.summary: Draws a rectangle made of dashes of a given size.

draw_rectangle_inverted.summary: Draws a rectangle which inverts the colors beneath it.

draw_roundrect_ext.summary: Draws a rectangle with rounded corners.

shader_set_uniform_color.summary: Sets a vec4 shader uniform with a color and alpha value.

shader_set_uniform_rgba.summary: Sets a vec4 shader uniform with red, green, blue, and alpha values.

draw_sprite_flip_ext.summary: Draws a sprite in the same manner as draw_sprite_ext() and can also flip the sprite horizontally and/or vertically.

draw_sprite_halfpixel.signature: draw_sprite_halfpixel(sprite, subimg, x, y, xscale, yscale, rot, color, alpha)
draw_sprite_halfpixel.summary: Draws a sprite transformed about the center of its origin pixel instead of the top-left corner.

draw_sprite_inverted.summary: Draws a sprite with inverted colors.

draw_sprite_inverted_ext.summary: Draws a sprite with inverted colors.

draw_sprite_percent.summary: Draws a sprite using a percentage to select a subimage to draw, the first subimage at 0% and the last subimage at 100%.

draw_sprite_rectangle.summary: Draws a rectangle using a sprite sliced into 9 sections.

draw_sprite_shear.summary: Draws a given sprite sheared by a given amount.

draw_sprite_stretched_direction.summary: Draws a sprite scaled along an arbitrary axis.

draw_sprite_tiled_area.summary: Draws a repeated sprite image, tiled to fill a given region and with a given offset.

draw_sprite_tiled_area_ext.summary: Draws a repeated sprite image, tiled to fill a given region and with a given offset.

draw_sprite_wave.summary: Draws a sprite with wave-like distortion.

draw_sprite_wave_ext.summary: Draws a sprite with wave-like distortion.

motion_blur.summary: Draws the assigned sprite of the calling instance, using its subimage, position, scaling, rotation, and blending settings, with a motion blur effect applied to it.

draw_surface_center.summary: Draws surface centered at given point.

draw_surface_center_ext.signature: draw_surface_center_ext(surface, cx, cy, xscale, yscale, rot, color, alpha)
draw_surface_center_ext.summary: Draws surface centered at given point with scaling, rotation, and blending.

draw_surface_center_rotate.summary: Draws surface centered at given point with rotation.

surface_create_clear.summary: Creates surface cleared with given color and alpha values.

draw_text_shadow.summary: Draws a given string with a simple shadow effect applied to it.

string_wordwrap_width.summary: Returns a given string, word wrapped to a pixel width, with line break characters inserted between words.

joystick_get_button.summary: Returns a button number of a given joystick, if pressed, or 0 if no button is pressed.

draw_get_button.summary: Draws a simple labeled button on the screen and returns true if it has been clicked using the left mouse button.

device_is_desktop.summary: Returns whether or not the current device is a desktop, workstation or laptop.

map_backgrounds.summary: Fills a given map data structure with the id values of all background resources, keyed by strings of their names.

map_fonts.summary: Fills a given map data structure with the id values of all font resources, keyed by strings of their names.

map_objects.summary: Fills a given map data structure with the id values of all object resources, keyed by strings of their names.

map_paths.summary: Fills a given map data structure with the id values of all path resources, keyed by strings of their names.

map_rooms.summary: Fills a given map data structure with the id values of all room resources, keyed by strings of their names.

map_sounds.summary: Fills a given map data structure with the id values of all sound resources, keyed by strings of their names.

map_sprites.summary: Fills a given map data structure with the id values of all sprite resources, keyed by strings of their names.

map_timelines.summary: Fills a given map data structure with the id values of all timeline resources, keyed by strings of their names.

sprite_desaturate.summary: Changes a sprite into a grayscale version of itself.

sprite_edit_begin.summary: Edit a sprite dynamically using drawing commands.

sprite_invert_color.summary: Inverts the colors of a given sprite.

sprite_replace_color.summary: Replaces one color in a given sprite with another.

sprite_replace_color_blend.summary: Replaces one range of colors of a given sprite with another.
